bibl.title: Coptic Egypt during the Persian Occupation. The Papyrological Evidence
bibl.note: The evidence of documentary papyri in Greek, Coptic, and Persian about daily life and administration in Egypt during the period A.D. 619-629.
bibl.seg: MacCoull Leslie S.B., Coptic Egypt during the Persian Occupation. The Papyrological Evidence. Avec résumé en anglais.
The evidence of documentary papyri in Greek, Coptic, and Persian about daily life and administration in Egypt during the period A.D. 619-629.
